featured.text: To convince people that temporary housing can be easily found.
However, if you convince yourself beforehand that the pain won’t be so bad, you might not suffer as much.
This was done mainly to convince people that the priests were powerful.

However, a man known as Mestre Bimba devoted a great deal of time and effort to convincing the Brazilian authorities that Capoeira has great cultural value and should become an official fighting style.

definition.en_def: To persuade someone to do or believe something.
definition.example: She tried to convince him to join the team.
